H0.text: Who was Cassius Clay's manager. Angelo Dundee's brother

H1.text: Who was Cassius Clay's manager. Sugar Ray Robinson

H2.text: Who was Cassius Clay's manager. Joe Louis

H3.text: Who was Cassius Clay's manager. Dundee

A4.text: Clay sought longtime idol Sugar Ray Robinson to be his manager, but was rebuffed.

A5.text: Clay hired Angelo Dundee to be his trainer.

A6.text: Angelo Dundee (born Angelo Mirena; August 30, 1921 â€“ February 1, 2012) was an American boxing trainer and cornerman.

A7.text: Dundee trained the young Cassius Clay, as Ali was then known.
